lgp.core.evolution.population

Class MicroMutationOperator<T>

  • MutationOperator
    • lgp.core.evolution.population.MicroMutationOperator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class MicroMutationOperator<T>
extends MutationOperator

    A class MutationOperator implementation that performs effective micro mutations.

    For more information, see Algorithm 6.2 from Linear Genetic Programming (Brameier, M., Banzhaf, W. 2001).

    Note that the constant mutation rate is 1 - (registerMutationRate - operatorMutationRate), which should be taken into account when choosing values for these parameters.

    See Also:
    class MutationOperator

    • Constructor Detail

      • MicroMutationOperator

        public MicroMutationOperator(Environment<T> environment,
                             double registerMutationRate,
                             double operatorMutationRate,
                             kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,? extends T> constantMutationFunc)

        A class MutationOperator implementation that performs effective micro mutations.

        For more information, see Algorithm 6.2 from Linear Genetic Programming (Brameier, M., Banzhaf, W. 2001).

        Note that the constant mutation rate is 1 - (registerMutationRate - operatorMutationRate), which should be taken into account when choosing values for these parameters.

        Parameters:
        registerMutationRate - The rate with which registers should be mutated.
        operatorMutationRate - The rate with which operates should be mutated.
        constantMutationFunc - A function that can mutate values in the domain ofT.
        See Also:
        class MutationOperator
